name: Torchwood: Web of Lies
description:
The conclusion of Miracle Day means the thrilling final episode of Web of Lies - don’t miss it! Download Episode 1 of Torchwood: Web of Lies for FREE now!

What happened to Jack and Gwen on that "missing day" back in 2007 - the day that neither remembers? Discover the hidden secret of Miracle Day by going back into Jack and Gwen’s past!

Torchwood: Web of Lies is a completely original 10 part episodic interactive experience that fuses together incredible motion comic graphics and gameplay to tell a digital-exclusive Torchwood story written by HUGO award winner Jane Espenson and Ryan Scott and Executive Produced by Russell T Davies.

Join lead characters Captain Jack Harkness and Gwen Cooper – voiced by John Barrowman and Eve Myles – AND introducing Eliza Dushku as the voice of Holly, a young woman intent on finding out what has happened to her brother and the world on Miracle Day.

Participate in a parallel narrative to "Torchwood: Miracle Day" that delves deeper into the dramatic events which have unfolded in the TV series. "Torchwood: Web of Lies" immerses you in the exciting world of Torchwood like never before as you crack codes, break locks and race across landscapes in search of the real truth behind Miracle Day.

Is it possible that a young, paranoid conspiracy theorist actually stumbled into the chilling truth and what it means for Miracle Day? The ONLY place to find out is in "Torchwood: Web of Lies."

This first FREE download gives you Episode 1 of Torchwood: Web of Lies. Then watch Torchwood: Miracle Day every week and return to the app for an opportunity to get a new episode of Web of Lies.

Every episode includes more original story told through motion graphics AND new gameplay, culminating in a thrilling interactive finale in Episode 10.

This application is made by BBC Worldwide. BBC Worldwide is a commercial company that is owned by the BBC. The profits BBC Worldwide make from it go back to BBC programme-makers to help fund great new BBC programmes.

INSTRUCTIONS TO RECOVER PURCHASES: If you previously purchased an episode pack, you will be able to purchase the same pack without being billed again. If you purchased all packs, you can download any individual pack without being charged again.
